content: if you loved my amarië beanie pattern you will love this free earwarmer pattern too **update ** the pattern is now available in hungarian too thanks to kinga pozsega say hello to the **amarië earwarmer** perfect for the chilly autumn morning walks it s a fun and easy pattern to use up some scrap aran/worsted yarn the pattern is easily adjustable to fit any size difficulty advaced beginner/intermediate us terms used throughout the design is using different stitches to create a nice textured look happy crocheting krisztina
